name: Ancient Sparta: Tower Defense
description:
In this offline Tower Defense game, you can build ancient Sparta and increase your power with upgrades in seven different buildings.

Choose between upgrades for six individual towers or three blockades and traps each. The stronger your defense, the easier it is for you to defeat your opponents. In addition, you can improve three special effects and give the enemy no chance, as well as carry out other upgrades that bring you strong advantages.

You can unlock many different levels and play each level on different levels of difficulty. Collect gold from the battles to further expand your power. Adapt your tactics to each level by carefully adapting your towers to the opponents.

Choose towers that destroy your opponents or blockades that stop your opponents. Use traps to decimate your opponents. Find your individual tactics and defeat different types of opponents and master epic boss waves. But be careful: some enemies can attack your towers. Always pay attention to the condition of your towers and improve or repair them in battle. If things get critical, you can turn the tide in your favor with power items.

This offline game is free-to-play. However, to accelerate your progress, you can watch advertisements or purchase products.
